articles.title: 5G phones set to launch in December 2023: OnePlus 12, Redmi 13C and more - India Today
articles.description: The last month of 2023 has just kicked in, and a few smartphone launches are already aligned for December. The 5G phones like OnePlus 12, Redmi 13C, and iQOO 12 are all set to be announced in the coming days. Here are the details.
